spec_data.Name: xml-commons-apis
spec_data.License: ASL 2.0 and W3C and Public Domain
spec_data.Description:
xml-commons-apis is designed to organize and have common packaging for
the various externally-defined standard interfaces for XML. This
includes the DOM, SAX, and JAXP.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:37:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: APIs for DOM, SAX, and JAXP
